fields.name: Fleece Pyjamas
fields.description:
Lovely Navy fleece in a fun star pattern. Suitable for keeping your dog warm on those chilly Autumn/Winter nights. The Fleece used is comfortable, easy to wear and very durable. Machine wash at 30 degrees.
SIZES:
S 22"-24" Small whippet
M 24"-26'' Large whippet
L 26"-28" Small greyhound
XL 28''-30'' Large greyhound

fields.name: Leather Fishtail Collar
fields.description:
Classic leather fishtail collar in a lovely tan brown. Fishtail collars are the only safe collars to use on those long sighthound necks and will keep your dog safe and secure.
Available in Small (suitable for whippets) and Large (suitable for greyhounds)

fields.name: Raised Stainless Steel Bowls
fields.description: The High Twin Feeder Stand (accompanied with 2 x 2.5 litre capacity dishes) allows your dog's food or water to be kept off the floor and offers a comfortable feeding height for medium and larger dog breeds.(Stand height is 370mm).

fields.name: Dry Dogs Waterproof coat
fields.description: Waterproof and warm this coat is perfect for those chilly Winter walks.

fields.name: Kong Rubber toy
fields.description: These robust rubber toys are perfect for large breeds. They are virtually indestructible and can be stuffed with treats to engage your dog for hours.
